noisepp::ScalePointModule

noisepp::ScalePointModule Class Reference

#include <NoiseScalePoint.h>

Inheritance diagram for noisepp::ScalePointModule:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Transforms the source module by scaling the coordinates.
